DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether RPC1063 is effective in the treatment of relapsing multiple sclerosis (RMS).
DOC.brief_title: Phase 3 Study of RPC1063 in Relapsing MS
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to learn about the effects and safety of experimental medication RPC1063 taken by mouth in the treatment of Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis (RMS).
DOC.criteria: Multiple sclerosis as diagnosed by the revised 2010 McDonald criteria EDSS score between 0 and 5.0 at baseline â€¢ Primary progressive multiple sclerosis
